info.description:
# NoteHub
A powerful markdown note-taking app for Nextcloud that combines the best of Joplin and Obsidian.
## Features - **Tasks & Reminders** – Interactive checkboxes with due dates and Nextcloud notifications - **Notebook Structure** – Organize notes in folders and notebooks - **Wikilinks** – Link notes with `[[Note Name]]` syntax and see backlinks - **Markdown Editor** – Comfortable editing with live preview
All notes are stored as standard `.md` files in your Nextcloud file system.
info.author: Ralf Völzke
